acceptOwnership().details: Can only be called by the pending owner

addExpressGas(bytes32,uint256,address,ui.details: This function can be called on the source chain after calling the gateway to express execute a remote contract.

params.gasFeeAmount: The amount of tokens to add as gas
params.gasToken: The ERC20 token address used to add gas
params.logIndex: The log index for the cross-chain call
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent
params.txHash: The transaction hash of the cross-chain call

addGas(bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,a.details: This function can be called on the source chain after calling the gateway to execute a remote contract.

params.gasFeeAmount: The amount of tokens to add as gas
params.gasToken: The ERC20 token address used to add gas
params.logIndex: The log index for the cross-chain call
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent
params.txHash: The transaction hash of the cross-chain call

addNativeExpressGas(bytes32,uint256,addr.details: This function can be called on the source chain after calling the gateway to express execute a remote contract.

params.logIndex: The log index for the cross-chain call
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent
params.txHash: The transaction hash of the cross-chain call

addNativeGas(bytes32,uint256,address).details: This function can be called on the source chain after calling the gateway to execute a remote contract.

params.logIndex: The log index for the cross-chain call
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent
params.txHash: The transaction hash of the cross-chain call

collectFees(address,address[],uint256[]).details: Use address(0) as the token address for native currency.

params.amounts: Array of amounts to be collected for each respective token address
params.receiver: The address to receive the collected fees
params.tokens: Array of token addresses to be collected

contractId().details: Meant to be overridden in derived contracts.

returns._0: address The address of the current owner

payGasForContractCall(address,string,str.details: This function is called on the source chain before calling the gateway to execute a remote contract.

params.destinationAddress: The target address on the destination chain
params.destinationChain: The target chain where the contract call will be made
params.gasFeeAmount: The amount of tokens to pay for gas
params.gasToken: The address of the ERC20 token used to pay for gas
params.payload: Data payload for the contract call
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent

payGasForContractCallWithToken(address,s.details: This function is called on the source chain before calling the gateway to execute a remote contract.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be sent with the call
params.destinationAddress: The target address on the destination chain
params.destinationChain: The target chain where the contract call with tokens will be made
params.gasFeeAmount: The amount of tokens to pay for gas
params.gasToken: The address of the ERC20 token used to pay for gas
params.payload: Data payload for the contract call with tokens
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent
params.symbol: The symbol of the token to be sent with the call

payGasForExpressCall(address,string,stri.details: This function is called on the source chain before calling the gateway to express execute a remote contract.

params.destinationAddress: The target address on the destination chain
params.destinationChain: The target chain where the contract call will be made
params.gasFeeAmount: The amount of tokens to pay for gas
params.gasToken: The address of the ERC20 token used to pay for gas
params.payload: Data payload for the contract call
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent

payGasForExpressCallWithToken(address,st.details: This function is called on the source chain before calling the gateway to express execute a remote contract.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be sent with the call
params.destinationAddress: The target address on the destination chain
params.destinationChain: The target chain where the contract call with tokens will be made
params.gasFeeAmount: The amount of tokens to pay for gas
params.gasToken: The address of the ERC20 token used to pay for gas
params.payload: Data payload for the contract call with tokens
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent
params.symbol: The symbol of the token to be sent with the call

payNativeGasForContractCall(address,stri.details: This function is called on the source chain before calling the gateway to execute a remote contract.

params.destinationAddress: The target address on the destination chain
params.destinationChain: The target chain where the contract call will be made
params.payload: Data payload for the contract call
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent

payNativeGasForContractCallWithToken(add.details: This function is called on the source chain before calling the gateway to execute a remote contract.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be sent with the call
params.destinationAddress: The target address on the destination chain
params.destinationChain: The target chain where the contract call with tokens will be made
params.payload: Data payload for the contract call with tokens
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent
params.symbol: The symbol of the token to be sent with the call

payNativeGasForExpressCall(address,strin.details: This function is called on the source chain before calling the gateway to execute a remote contract.

params.destinationAddress: The target address on the destination chain
params.destinationChain: The target chain where the contract call will be made
params.payload: Data payload for the contract call
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent

payNativeGasForExpressCallWithToken(addr.details: This function is called on the source chain before calling the gateway to execute a remote contract.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be sent with the call
params.destinationAddress: The target address on the destination chain
params.destinationChain: The target chain where the contract call with tokens will be made
params.payload: Data payload for the contract call with tokens
params.refundAddress: The address where refunds, if any, should be sent
params.symbol: The symbol of the token to be sent with the call

returns._0: address The address of the pending owner

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to

refund(bytes32,uint256,address,address,u.details: Only callable by the gasCollector.Use address(0) as the token address to refund native currency.

params.logIndex: The log index for the cross-chain call
params.receiver: The address to receive the refund
params.token: The token address to be refunded
params.txHash: The transaction hash of the cross-chain call

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to

acceptOwnership().notice: Transfers ownership to the pending owner.

addExpressGas(bytes32,uint256,address,ui.notice: Add additional gas payment using ERC20 tokens after initiating an express cross-chain call.

addGas(bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,a.notice: Add additional gas payment using ERC20 tokens after initiating a cross-chain call.

addNativeExpressGas(bytes32,uint256,addr.notice: Add additional gas payment using native currency after initiating an express cross-chain call.

addNativeGas(bytes32,uint256,address).notice: Add additional gas payment using native currency after initiating a cross-chain call.

collectFees(address,address[],uint256[]).notice: Allows the gasCollector to collect accumulated fees from the contract.

contractId().notice: Returns the contract ID. It can be used as a check during upgrades.

gasCollector().notice: Returns the address of the designated gas collector.

owner().notice: Returns the current owner of the contract.

payGasForContractCall(address,string,str.notice: Pay for gas using ERC20 tokens for a contract call on a destination chain.

payGasForContractCallWithToken(address,s.notice: Pay for gas using ERC20 tokens for a contract call with tokens on a destination chain.

payGasForExpressCall(address,string,stri.notice: Pay for gas using ERC20 tokens for an express contract call on a destination chain.

payGasForExpressCallWithToken(address,st.notice: Pay for gas using ERC20 tokens for an express contract call with tokens on a destination chain.

payNativeGasForContractCall(address,stri.notice: Pay for gas using native currency for a contract call on a destination chain.

payNativeGasForContractCallWithToken(add.notice: Pay for gas using native currency for a contract call with tokens on a destination chain.

payNativeGasForExpressCall(address,strin.notice: Pay for gas using native currency for an express contract call on a destination chain.

payNativeGasForExpressCallWithToken(addr.notice: Pay for gas using native currency for an express contract call with tokens on a destination chain.

pendingOwner().notice: Returns the address of the pending owner of the contract.

proposeOwnership(address).notice: Proposes to transfer the contract's ownership to a new address. The new owner needs to accept the ownership explicitly.

refund(bytes32,uint256,address,address,u.notice: Refunds gas payment to the receiver in relation to a specific cross-chain transaction.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address
